mapper.select: SELECT m.member_seq AS memberSeq, m.member_name AS memberName, m.fk_grade_seq AS fkGradeSeq, m.fk_department_seq AS fkDepartmentSeq, g.grade_name AS gradeName, g.grade_seq AS gradeSeq, d.department_name AS departmentName FROM tbl_member m JOIN tbl_grade g ON m.fk_grade_seq = g.grade_seq LEFT JOIN tbl_department d ON m.fk_department_seq = d.department_seq
